steps.title: Welcome to PetitPal
steps.subtitle: Your voice-first assistant
steps.voice_text: Welcome to PetitPal! I'm your voice-first assistant, designed to help you with questions, conversations, and daily tasks. Let's get you set up.

steps.title: Voice Setup
steps.subtitle: Let's test your microphone
steps.voice_text: First, let's make sure I can hear you clearly. I'll need permission to use your microphone. This stays private on your device.

steps.title: Choose Your Theme
steps.subtitle: Pick what looks best for you
steps.voice_text: Now let's choose a theme that's comfortable for your eyes. You can always change this later in settings.

steps.title: AI Assistant Setup
steps.subtitle: Connect your AI provider
steps.voice_text: To give you the best responses, you'll need to add an API key from an AI provider like OpenAI, Google, or others. This is optional - you can skip for now.

steps.title: All Set!
steps.subtitle: PetitPal is ready to help
steps.voice_text: Perfect! PetitPal is now ready to assist you. Just tap the microphone button and start talking. I'll help you with questions, information, and conversations.
